item.title: notion backup
item.description: configuring backup Forked: upleveled/notion-backup: Export Notion pages and subpages to a GitHub repo on a schedule (eg. to be used as a scheduled backup)

item.title: Obsidian Clipper
item.description: Plugin: jplattel/obsidian-clipper: A Chrome extension that easily clips selections to Obsidian (github.com) Extension options: Note to clip to: private\{zettel} Clipping format:

item.title: royal kludge shortcuts
item.description: Source: RK61 keyboard shortcuts â€’ defkey royal kludge shortcuts 1 2 FN + Enter = Enable /disable arrow keys FN + Right control = switch between keyboard letters and functions (ie Y is Printscreen and vice versa) Keyboard Tester

item.title: Sharing specific obsidian notes with screenshots
item.description: Setting up screenshot uploads By default, Obsidian stores the screenshots locally. Configure Imgur to hold the screenshots for easy online sharing.
